title: Jack Daniels Package
content:
Hi everybody. I know this has come up several times before and there is no exact fonts but I was wondering if anyone could tell me simliar fonts?

Peregroy JF/FF Jackie - Tennesse  
Old Time - Helvetica  
Ornaments - Caslon  
Whiskey - ITC Korinna  
7 -? (really looking for a similar number range)  
No - Crash Numbering Serif  
Jack Daniels - ?

Thanks for help

Rick

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Jack-Daniels-Tennesee-Posters.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051548/http:/typophile.com/files/Jack-Daniels-Tennesee-Posters.jpg) | 49.22 KB |
author: rtgbanks

comments.content:
I don't have font recommendations, but if you're just looking for the logo:

[http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=search&text=Daniel%27s](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051548/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=search&text=Daniel%27s "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=search&text=Daniel%27s")

(there isn't an exact EPS of the poster you have, but the last version is the closest.)
Thanks asvetic...have already got the eps....just want similar fonts as I am doing a book about Jack Daniels
Sounds cool. Sorry, I could help more specifically.

[http://www.jdstudiono7.com/livefromsn7/default.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051548/http:/www.jdstudiono7.com/livefromsn7/default.htm "http://www.jdstudiono7.com/livefromsn7/default.htm")

Click on the city font anyone?

[http://www6.semo.edu/ibp/images/006\_3A.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051548/http:/www6.semo.edu/ibp/images/006_3A.JPG "http://www6.semo.edu/ibp/images/006\_3A.JPG")

Rickyard font

Must be a font for this?

Thanks people

Sorry to bump, but surly someone knows the Rickyard font?

Please people...really want to know this font.

Cheers

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dry-county-b_5476.jpg)

Cheers Bald Condensed...it does look stretched. Can you identify this one please? I am in need of a nice "JD" font...with a tennesse feel!

Cheers

Rick

[Franklin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/franklin_gothic_complete_vp/), the original ATF version. I wanted to link to the Bitstream digitisation which has the italic, but can't seem to find it.
Thanks alot bald condensed! Appreciate it

[qoute]Jack Daniels - ?[/qoute]

Jack Daniels is:  
Black No.7 - Black Label.ttf  
Black No.7 Vintage.ttf
